name: Marco Guarnieri
content: Marco Guarnieri Marco Guarnieri Associate professor IMDEA Software Institute Biography I am an associate professor at the IMDEA Software Institute. Before that, I completed my Ph.D. at the Institute of Information Security at ETH Zurich. My research focuses on the design, analysis, and implementation of practical systems for securely storing and processing sensitive data. Recently, I have been working on building foundations and tools for reasoning about security at the hardware-software boundary, with a specific focus on microarchitectural attacks and defenses.
